content: The Special-made Bone Strengthening Pellet can be found during Chen Loong's quest in The New West. Chen Loong is to the left of of the Shrine after stepping off Turtle Island in Bitter Lake. You will initially need to fight him, but after he has been defeated, he will ask you to get some medicine from Xu Dog.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Special-made_Bone-Strengthening_Pellet.md', within the main section titled 'Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet'.
The content is as follows:
The Special-made Bone Strengthening Pellet can be found during Chen Loong's quest in The New West. Chen Loong is to the left of of the Shrine after stepping off Turtle Island in Bitter Lake. You will initially need to fight him, but after he has been defeated, he will ask you to get some medicine from Xu Dog.
